snippet.title: BUSTAFELLOWS - Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1494470/BUSTAFELLOWS/

eXtend brings a new visual novel to the West! Mixing romance with murders and the dangerous ikemen, BUSTAFELLOWS in a gripping story that will make you shiver but ask for more!

Arrive in New Sieg, a beautiful fictional town set in America. You play the part of a young woman with the ability to with the ability to leap in the past for a very short period in the bodies of others. After witnessing the murder of a crooked lawyer – she goes back in time in an attempt to save him. It's up to you to figure out how to save him!

Coming to Steam and Nintendo Switch in 2021!

https://pqube.co.uk/bustafellows

Follow PQube Games on social media!
Discord: https://discord.gg/pqubegames 
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/pqubegames/ 
Twitter: https://twitter.com/PQubeGames 
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/pqubegames/
